query: SELECT SUM(price) FROM Orders WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-01-01' AND '2025-03-31';
SELECT SUM(price) FROM DeletedOrders WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-01-01' AND '2025-03-31';
SELECT SUM(price) FROM Orders WHERE date >= date('now', '-3 months');
SELECT SUM(price) FROM DeletedOrders WHERE date >= date('now', '-3 months');
SELECT SUM(o.price + d.price) FROM Orders o JOIN DeletedOrders d ON o.billno = d.billno WHERE o.date >= date('now', '-3 months');
SELECT SUM(price) FROM Orders WHERE strftime('%Y-%m', date) = strftime('%Y-%m', date('now', '-1 month'));
SELECT SUM(price) FROM DeletedOrders WHERE strftime('%Y-%m', date) = strftime('%Y-%m', date('now', '-1 month'));
SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', date) AS month, SUM(price) AS monthly_revenue FROM Orders WHERE date BETWEEN date('now', '-3 months') AND date('now') GROUP BY month;
SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', date) AS month, SUM(price) AS monthly_revenue FROM DeletedOrders WHERE date BETWEEN date('now', '-3 months') AND date('now') GROUP BY month;

SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', date) AS month, SUM(price) AS monthly_revenue FROM (SELECT date, price FROM Orders UNION ALL SELECT date, price FROM DeletedOrders) WHERE date BETWEEN date('now', '-3 months') AND date('now') GROUP BY month;
SELECT SUM(price) FROM Orders WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-01-01' AND '2025-03-31' UNION ALL SELECT SUM(price) FROM DeletedOrders WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-01-01' AND '2025-03-31';
SELECT SUM(price) FROM Orders UNION ALL SELECT SUM(price) FROM DeletedOrders;
SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', date) AS month, SUM(price) AS monthly_revenue FROM Orders GROUP BY month;
SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', date) AS month, SUM(price) AS monthly_revenue FROM DeletedOrders GROUP BY month;

SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', o.date) AS order_month, SUM(o.price) AS order_revenue, strftime('%Y-%m', d.date) AS deleted_order_month, SUM(d.price) AS deleted_revenue FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN DeletedOrders d ON strftime('%Y-%m', o.date) = strftime('%Y-%m', d.date) GROUP BY order_month, deleted_order_month;
